Token.Abstract: The validator text view is the central object to use. It inherits UITextView and listens internally to all own changes. After every change it validates the changed text material. When a validator, which was added to the validator text view, reports a violation the validatorTextViewDelegate will be served with this information. The validatorTextViewDelegate is of type US2ValidatorTextViewDelegate and returns what went wrong and in which status the validation text field is at the moment.
